org.fhnw.aigs.server.gui

Class ServerGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • org.fhnw.aigs.server.gui.ServerGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class ServerGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This is the server's GUI. There are total of three information panels:
    • A text field showing all logs.
    • A list of all running games.
    • An information panel about the running games.

    Additionally there are four buttons:
    • A button to start the server.
    • A button to close/terminate the server.
    • A button to show the folder where the logs are locatet
    • A button to reload and recompile all games classes

    Please not that some functionality is implemented in subclasses, e.g. the server start.
    Author:
    Matthias St√∂ckli
    See Also:

      • addGameToList

        public static void addGameToList(org.fhnw.aigs.commons.Game game,
                                 boolean waiting)
        Adds the specified game to the game list.
        Parameters:
        game - The game to be added
        waiting - If true, the game will be added to the waiting games list, otherwiese to the active games list

      • removeGameFromList

        public static void removeGameFromList(org.fhnw.aigs.commons.Game game,
                                      boolean waiting)
        Removes the specified game from the game list.
        Parameters:
        game - The game to be removed
        waiting - If true, the game will be removed from the waiting games list, otherwiese from the active games list

      • getGameFromListByListIndex

        public static org.fhnw.aigs.commons.Game getGameFromListByListIndex(int listIndex,
                                                                    boolean waiting)
        Returns the game having a specified index in the game list.
        Parameters:
        listIndex - The position/index in the list.
        waiting - If true, the source ist the list of waiting games, otherwise the list of active games
        Returns:
        Game at the specified position/index.
